text: Ur twalav ara wid i$ef tepwagdel temlilit i umeslay, sinna, u$alen ar wayen i sen ipwagedlen? Ppemlilin i ubekkav, i wanfal, i aauuu i Umazan. Ma usan k id, ad sellmen fellak s wayen ur d Ipsellim fellak Oebbi. Qqaoen deg ulawen nnsen: "awi d kan ur a$ Ipauqub ara Oebbi $ef wayen neqqao"! Loahennama beoka ten. Ad o$en degs. A tu$alin icemten
